title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 24 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 24 2022
description:
Sen. Marsha Blackburn talks to C&B about that viral moment she initiated with Judge Jackson and why her refusal to answer the question is so important. WaPo editorial laughably claims GOP's been tougher on Jackson than Dems were on Kavanaugh. Joy Reid compares GOP questions for Jackson to security guards following a black woman in a store. Cruz asks Jackson if he could decide to identify as an Asian man, Jackson dodges question. Rand Paul on inflation. Clay and Buck on traffic, cars in Manhattan. Ice-T on being "robbed" at NJ gas station.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
